attributes.bio: Jonah is a writer who splits his time between dissecting urban design trends and ranking obscure ‘90s sci-fi movies. With a knack for connecting architecture to film sets, his perspective brings Hollywood to the streets of any city. Why he’s cool: He’s the guy explaining how Blade Runner influenced your favorite coworking space, all while winning trivia night with a random Oscar fact.
